title: Men's Color Block Fashion Sneakers Walking Casual Athletic Shoes Chunky Platform Sneakers
features: Color Block Design. Solid colors blocks on different parts, suede vamp, plastic, make color contrast for visual impact. Pair with your favorite cloth for a fabulous look or with your everyday casual for effortless chic style.

High Quality Material. Mainly made of durable PU leather, thick rubber, suede and plastic. They are wear-resistant and shock-resistant, with air cushion design, providing a long-lasting and comfortable pedaling feeling and relieving foot fatigue.
Breathability. Shoes inside adopts elastic fit design, the lining fits around, which can absorb sweat from your feet. And the mesh breathable insole provides you a cool and comfy wear environment.

Anti-slip Shoe Sole. Thick sole sneakers is designed with many lumps on the bottom, which provides cushioning and support effect for the feet and greatly reduces the risk of sliding back and forth. It makes your step more stable and safer.

Occasion. Perfect choice to pair with any sport or casual outfit. Suitable for parties, casual, walking, running, indoor, sports, outdoor, travel, exercise, workout and any occasions. Instantly takes your style from bland to bold.
description: Floette Men's Color blocked Fashion Sneakers

Whether you are a skateboard player, street dancer, or other sports lover, these fantastic shoes are your must-have to fully show your chic style, good taste in dress, and impress others, win the battle.

-Solid colors blocks, strong color contrast for visual impact, retro but also trendy street style. -High quality material provides a long-lasting and comfortable pedaling feeling and relieving foot fatigue. -Breathable shoes inside design provides your feet a cool and comfy wear environment. -Anti-slip shoe sole makes your step more stable and safer. -Instantly takes your style from bland to bold. Pair with your favorite cloth for a fabulous look or with your everyday casual for effortless chic style.
